name: Blackout (itch) (Cassie, GummiGamer, itisnicole, TheGameWizard99)
description:
Embark on a small puzzle solving journey with Lampert as he desperately traverses the endless darkness of the kitchen to seek the last source of power left in his world... (and possibly cross paths with a lettuce god along the way.)

WASD to move, and click and drag items from your inventory into the environment to use them or combine them with other items in the environment.

Press ESC to go back to the main menu.

Credits:

Code and art: "cassie-loyan"

Designer: Tyler Robertson "TheGameWizard99"

Designer: Harrison Black "GummiGamer"

Music and sound design: Nicole Yazmin "itisnicole"
